message: Let's split it evenly, Bob. Fair is fair, right?
I think I deserve a bit more, don't you?
Okay, I'll give you a bit more. But let's not get too greedy, Bob. We have to be able to agree to split this money.
You're getting closer, but I think I can do better.
Alright, Bob, I'm willing to go a bit higher. But this is my final offer. Let's not let this money slip away.
